message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid I'm not comfortable selling it to you for $80. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $120. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $110, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit short of my budget, so I'd like to make another offer. How about $105? Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm glad you're still interested, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to give up on getting the price I want. I can do $115, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm afraid $115 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to sell it to me for that price, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $100.
